DataElement.preferredName: Health Status Assessment Clinical Observation Result Unit of Measure Data Source Data Value Unit of Measure
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An appraisal or evaluation of a patient's condition by a clinician that is based on a physical exam, medical history, and the patient's account of symptoms.:The act, by a healthcare worker, of monitoring an identified subject and recording signs, symptoms, or behavior._An outcome of observation represented as a text, qualitative, or quantitative parameter, code, image, graph, etc._A named quantity in terms of which other quantities are measured or specified, used as a standard measurement of like kinds._The person or authoritative body who provided the information._The information contained in a data field. It may represent a numeric quantity, a textual characterization, a date or time measurement, or some other state, depending on the nature of the attribute.:An outcome of observation represented as a text, qualitative, or quantitative parameter, code, image, graph, etc._A named quantity in terms of which other quantities are measured or specified, used as a standard measurement of like kinds.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An appraisal or evaluation of a patient's condition by a physician or registered nurse, based on clinical and laboratory data, medical history, and the patient's account of symptoms.  2. The process by which a patient's condition is appraised or evaluated. (Taber's)

Concepts.definition: An appraisal or evaluation of a patient's condition by a clinician that is based on a physical exam, medical history, and the patient's account of symptoms.
